reviewText: My grandmother wanted me to order this for her and she does it every morning at 90 years old.  Amazing.
20 minutes of stretches to maintain independence.
these exercises are perfect for me cause I am old.
We have yet to review the entire video. What we have seen is very well done
I have already worn out a tape and a dvd over the years. Great exercise experience for those that are either elderly or have limited range of motion.
Okay for a relaxed morning warm up and stretch
This DVD is great for older people!  It combines several modalities from yoga to tai chi to shiatsu - all of which help strengthen and relax.
